definition: to sign (one's name with a pen etc)/to autograph/signature
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 離線手寫簽名鑑別的主要困難在於簽名特徵的提取。

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 離線手寫簽名鑑別的主要困難在於簽名特徵的提取。

sentences.english: If you'd just sign the register.
sentences.chinese: 每個職員必須在工作時間記錄簿上簽名。

sentences.english: The Government of Japan will receive further signatures, as the Depositary of the ACTA.
sentences.chinese: 作爲協定受託國，日本國政府將負責接收進一步簽名。

sentences.english: Now those that sealed were, Nehemiah, the Tirshatha, the son of Hachaliah, and Zidkijah.
sentences.chinese: 簽名的是哈迦利亞的兒子省長尼希米和西底家。

sentences.english: Every one of the staff must sign the time-book.
sentences.chinese: 每個職員必須在工作時間記錄簿上簽名。

sentences.english: That's not bad for a signing, but it's a lot of work.
sentences.chinese: 對於簽名售書來說，這已經不錯了，但很費事。

sentences.english: A captain in the Navy ranks above a captain in the Army.
sentences.chinese: 美國陸軍上尉或海軍上校有由總統簽名的委任狀。

sentences.english: This step can ensure that the signers of form are trusted.
sentences.chinese: 這一步驟可以確保表單的簽名者是可信的。

sentences.english: Now try to install the update site embedded with the signed plug-in.
sentences.chinese: 現在，嘗試通過帶簽名的插件安裝嵌入的更新站點。

sentences.english: Offer a signature cocktail instead of an open bar.
sentences.chinese: 提供簽名雞尾酒會而非免費酒吧。

sentences.english: But the old goat to see the signature of the letter, the most perplexing.
sentences.chinese: 但是老色鬼看到信的簽名後，傻了眼。

sentences.english: This must be co-signed by a family member.
sentences.chinese: 這份記錄還必須由一位家屬的共同簽名。

sentences.english: Research on problem of data redundancy in wide area sensor databases;
sentences.chinese: 該方案具有強不可僞造性，且簽名結果不含冗餘數據。

sentences.english: Please ensure that all the account holder(s) or authorized signatories sign this exchange form.
sentences.chinese: 請帳戶持有人或法人代表於此處簽名。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
